metadata.title: CVE-2016-6627 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in phpMyAdmin. An attacker can determine thephpMyAdmin host location through the file url.php. All 4.6.x versions(prior to 4.6.4), 4.4.x versions (prior to 4.4.15.8), and 4.0.x versions(prior to 4.0.10.17) are affected.

criterions.comment: phpmyadmin package in xenial is affected and needs fixing.
